Package com.sixbank.notificationlibrary.shared.constants

Class NotificationConstants

java.lang.Object
com.sixbank.notificationlibrary.shared.constants.NotificationConstants
public final class NotificationConstants extends Object
Centralized constants used across notification services, including Kafka configuration, headers, timeouts, retry logic, rate limiting, template variables, and defaults.

This class is not intended to be instantiated.
